title: Best Top Lane Champion?!?
body: I need some advice or some help in picking my next top lane champion. I play lots of top lane and use a lot of the champions that dwell there, but recently its been getting a bit stale and need a new champion to spice things up a bit{{champion:92}} . I just feel that I need to try new things and adapt to my "main lane" as much as possible if anyone can relate. I don't always top if that is what your thinking. I will occasionally fill the jungle roll {{champion:32}} or play the hardship of the bot lane{{champion:42}} , but top lane is my home and my goal is to learn each champ to their full potential. Let me know what you feel is best in the comments and I will try to respond A.S.A.P.

replies.body: All depends on the match up. Malphite is strong rn. So are bruisers.

{{champion:39}} is probably the best top laner in the game right now. 

{{champion:41}} is pretty much constantly strong.

{{champion:62}} is pretty consistently a good solo queue pick.

{{champion:14}} is also good if your team needs a tank.

{{champion:157}} built as a tanky bruiser ({{item:3078}} {{item:3022}} {{item:1001}} {{item:3026}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3053}} ) is very strong.

{{champion:122}} is solid.
For the love of god and everything holy please don't become a Riven main
